Steps.Message: Its David here and I will be taking over Aaron this afternoon to personally keep you up to date with the latest available information from site. In the meantime if you want to speak to us, you can contact us via Facebook or on twitter @UKPowernetworks where the team I work on will be happy to help, 24/7.

We became aware of a power cut at 08:37. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Its David here and I will be taking over Aaron this afternoon to personally keep you up to date with the latest available information from site. In the meantime if you want to speak to us, you can contact us via Facebook or on twitter @UKPowernetworks where the team I work on will be happy to help, 24/7.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
